item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: I will try to keep this blog alive and put everything related to my studies, work and life.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! My name is Mekhti Musaev (spelled as Mehti Musayev). I’m currently employed as a Machine Learning Engineer at CGI Suomi Oy in Finland. If you have interesting positions closely related to Machine Learning field (Machine Learning Engineer/Data Scientist/AI Engineer), feel free to drop me a message via email or LinkedIn. In my leisure time I enjoy travelling, playing table tennis (aka ping pong), tennis, badminton, cycling, swimming, surfing (Portugal, eu te amo) and snowboarding.

item.title: Curriculum vitae
item.description: The most recent version of my cv is on my LinkedIn profile. Also, you can find pdf version of my CV here. I always interested in good companies. If I am already employed, don’t hesitate to drop me a message about open positions.

item.title: Projects
item.description: During my career I have been collaborating into limited number of open source and industrial projects. My volunteer work for open source community started in 2016 when I was using several projects at work. In the following list one can find all open source and industrial projects where I am currently/used to be represented as a collaborator/team member: Open source projects: RedBaron baron yapf (owned by Google) ELFI (owned by Aalto University, Finland) Industrial projects:
